person.persName: Nelson Jolly, Jr. (Breckinridge County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, farmer. Son of Nelson Jolly, Sr. Married to Barbara Barr Jolly. Father of Mary Jolly, Sallie Jolly, John B. Jolly, James G. Jolly, Samuel J. Jolly, Gideon P. Jolly, Bettie A. Jolly, Adam N. Jolly, Thomas J. Jolly, David C. Jolly, Henry C. Jolly, and Francis M. Jolly. Sergeant in 3rd Regiment (Allen's) Mounted, Kentucky Volunteers in the War of 1812. Magistrate of Breckinridge County. Sheriff of Breckinridge County in 1849. Farmer in Breckinridge County in 1850. Resident of Breckinridge County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in 1850 and six in 1860.
